title: Forbes is shutting down its investing app — consider these 8 alternative automated investing apps
description: Forbes is shutting down its AI-powered investment app in December. Here are 8 alternative AI-powered apps and robo-advisors. Start investing today.

title: Why ESG Is A Top Priority Of CFOs
description: The published version of Forbes' CFO newsletter delivers the latest news for chief financial officers and other budget-focused leaders to inboxes every Tuesday.

title: What The SEC’s SolarWinds Charges Mean For CFOs And Their Peers—8 Steps To Forge A Chain Of Accountability
description: The SEC’s charges against SolarWinds and its CISO are a game-changer, signaling the SEC espouses a broader view of accountability extending beyond the CEO and CFO to the rest of the C-suite.

title: Banks, Insurers May Escape EU’s Toughest ESG Regulation So Far
description: Banks, asset managers and other financial firms have won a reprieve from Europe’s most consequential ESG regulation to date, as a wave of intense industry lobbying pays off. Spain, which holds the European Union’s rotating presidency, has proposed that financ…

title: Temenos to Work with MAS to Advance Sustainable Finance
description: Collaboration with Gprnt on technology solutions powering the future of sustainable finance Collaboration with Gprnt on technology solutions powering the future of sustainable finance
